content.description: Two hand match-start on left side near the base, near the rock scaring. Boulder in sand is on. Traverse along roof lip and top out on side facing Arena Foo. Continuing the traverse and attempting to mantle on the north side of the rock is an easier finish.** Bottom rock broke, so reverting back to original proposed beta of starting matched on rock.

Nothing like a friend hug to send you straight to the friendzone. Compression start that connects with V1/2 Friend Zone.Left hand on the left side around rock scar and right hand on the right side near the base. There are three semi-distinct bump/hold options on the right, choose the lowest one as your start. Bottom rock in the sand is on. Hug your way up a bit, transition to roof edge, mantle up the side facing Arena Foo/Siblings. Don't go around the corner when attempting to top out.Feels like a V3 mostly, but harder than many of the V3s that I've tried at SoMo...so maybe at best a low V4 for the area? I'll let the community decide.Smallish boulder so the dyno is there, but every time you dyno a puppy dies so...that's on you.

Right above Arena Foo and below Simple.Smallish boulder that offers a fun compression problem as well as a friendly roof lip traverse. Fall is tiny but uneven so bring at least 2 pads. Ideally 3-4 and a friend to spot.
